body.p:
327
Nov. 19th 3
Maj. W. M. Sidell -- U. S. A.
A. A. Pro. Mar. Gen.
Louisville -- Ky.
Major,

Capt. James Thompson of 2nd Artillery -- U. S. A. has been ordered to report to the Governor -- who is raising a regiment of artillery for him to command. He is stationed at Covington. There is great trouble encountered in mustering in recruits -- and it would greatly benefit both the Servise and , if you would appoint him a mustering officer.
He is on recruiting service now, by direction of the Governor -- at Covington. If ^you^ will so appoint him -- please communicate with me.

Respectfully
Your obt sev't
John Boyle
Adjt. Gen of Ky
